oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Municipal Airport, Nashville, Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Eastern Airlines airplane pictured in front of the Municipal Airport in Nashville, Tennessee. American and Tennessee flags and red, white & blue bunting decorate the building. A crowd of men in suits stands near the plane.
May depict the opening of the airport in . Sold by Nashville Card Co., Nashville, Tenn.
Dr. Harry S. Vaughn, Nashville, Tennessee.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Wiles-Hood
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Airports; Airplanes; Transportation facilities; Flags; Celebrations
